Prescisely.
I fought a Luigi who basically used a tilt exploit and acted like hot shit the entire way through. Then he chose Wario and while he acted like hot shit, managed to commit suicide and give me the win by accident.

What really insulted me was a Jigglypuff who literally threw away his first stock and still won just to spite me.
_Fuck For Glory, it's full of fucking cunts._

GOD I hate that function in this game.

I've been kicked out of Online like three times because of that shit, Like one of the players were attacking me so of course I'd go for him! Plus he was winning so what the fuck?!


"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f920c86368725f000c0400#post_54f920c86368725f000c0400
That shit is the absolute worse. Like I don't run into those kind of people often but when I do it fucking *SUCKS*.

One of the things I like to run into are people that are good sports, like lets both act like idiots. Lets Taunt in the first round, And just have some good ass games.

Not, I'm going to obviously be a asshole. For Glory can get worse in the WII U version because people found out you can change your name box online and write mean comments.

Like someone wrote in one of them to me "You suck" and other dumb things. honestly I fined it funny.
